subject: RE: [junit] execution log file
msgSnippet: Do ant 1.3 and Junit 3.7 work correctly for you?  I get [junit]  java.lang.AbstractMethodError [junit] [junit]   at
messageBody:
Do ant 1.3 and Junit 3.7 work correctly for you?  I get
 
    [junit]  java.lang.AbstractMethodError
    [junit]
    [junit]   at junit.framework.TestResult.addFailure(TestResult.java:46)
    [junit]
    [junit]   at junit.framework.TestResult.runProtected(TestResult.java:127)
    [junit]
    [junit]   at junit.framework.TestResult.run(TestResult.java:109)
    [junit]
    [junit]   at junit.framework.TestCase.run(TestCase.java:131)
    [junit]
    [junit]   at junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:173)
    [junit]
    [junit]   at junit.framework.TestSuite.run(TestSuite.java:168)
    [junit]
    [junit]   at junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:173)
    [junit]
    [junit]   at junit.framework.TestSuite.run(TestSuite.java:168)
    [junit]
    [junit]   at junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:173)
    [junit]
    [junit]   at junit.framework.TestSuite.run(TestSuite.java:168)
    [junit]
    [junit]   at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTestRunner.run(JUnitTestRunner.java:202)
    [junit]
    [junit]   at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTestRunner.main(JUnitTestRunner.java:326)
    [junit]
    [junit] TEST test.TestAll FAILED
-----Original Message-----
From: Yishay Mor [mailto:ymor@...]
Sent: 04 July 2001 13:07
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] execution log file

Using JUnit with ant, you get a nicely formatted html report.

At 03:59 PM 7/4/2001 +0530, you wrote:
you have to write your own log file and upto my knowledge there is no log
file provided by the JUnit.Ii have  written a logfile class to which all the
results are returned.If you are interested,i'll send that.

sandhya

Stephen or Carlene Peterson wrote:

> --- Hrishikesh <rushi_kesh@...> wrote:
> > is there any execution log file provided by junit
> > wheres i can se all the results
> >
> >
> > =====
> > RISHIKESH
